verses.verse: Then the Lord <WH3068> answered <WH6030> Job <WH347> out of the whirlwind <WH9370> and said, <WH559>
"Who <WH4310> is this <WH2088> that darkens <WH2821> counsel <WH6098> By words <WH4405> without <WH1097> knowledge <WH1847>?
"Now <WH4994> gird <WH247> up your loins <WH2504> like a man, <WH1397> And I will ask <WH7592> you, and you instruct <WH3045> Me!
"Where <WH375> were you when I laid <WH3245> the foundation <WH3245> of the earth <WH776>? Tell <WH5046> [Me,] if <WH518> you have <WH3045> understanding, <WH998>
Who <WH4310> set <WH7760> its measurements, <WH4461> since <WH3588> you know <WH3045>? Or <WH176> who <WH4310> stretched <WH5186> the line <WH6957> on it?
"On what <WH4100> were its bases <WH134> sunk <WH2883>? Or <WH176> who <WH4310> laid <WH3384> its cornerstone, <WH68> <WH6438>
When the morning <WH1242> stars <WH3556> sang <WH7442> together, <WH3162> And all <WH3605> the sons <WH1121> of God <WH430> shouted <WH7321> for joy <WH7321>?
"Or [who] enclosed <WH9353> the sea <WH3220> with doors, <WH1817> When, bursting <WH1518> forth, <WH1518> it went <WH3318> out from the womb; <WH7358>
When I made <WH7760> a cloud <WH6051> its garment, <WH3830> And thick <WH6205> darkness <WH6205> its swaddling <WH2854> band, <WH2854>
And I placed <WH7665> boundaries <WH2706> on it, And I set <WH7760> a bolt <WH1280> and doors, <WH1817>
And I said, <WH559> 'Thus <WH6311> far <WH5704> you shall come, <WH935> but no <WH3808> farther; <WH3254> And here <WH6311> shall your proud <WH1347> waves <WH1530> stop <WH7896>'?
"Have you ever <WH4480> <WH3117> in your life <WH4480> <WH3117> commanded <WH6680> the morning, <WH1242> [And] caused the dawn <WH7837> to know <WH3045> its place; <WH4725>
That it might take <WH270> hold <WH270> of the ends <WH3671> of the earth, <WH776> And the wicked <WH7563> be shaken <WH5287> out of it?
"It is changed <WH2015> like clay <WH2563> [under] the seal; <WH2368> And they stand <WH3320> forth <WH3320> like <WH3644> a garment. <WH3830>
"And from the wicked <WH7563> their light <WH216> is withheld, <WH4513> And the uplifted <WH7311> arm <WH2220> is broken. <WH7665>
"Have you entered <WH935> into the springs <WH5033> of the sea <WH3220>? Or have you walked <WH1980> in the recesses <WH2714> of the deep <WH8415>?
"Have the gates <WH8179> of death <WH4194> been revealed <WH1540> to you? Or have you seen <WH7200> the gates <WH8179> of deep <WH6757> darkness <WH6757>?
"Have you understood <WH995> the expanse <WH7338> of the earth <WH776>? Tell <WH5046> [Me,] if <WH518> you know <WH3045> all <WH3605> this.
"Where <WH335> is the way <WH1870> to the dwelling <WH7931> of light <WH216>? And darkness, <WH2822> where <WH335> is its place, <WH4725>
That you may take <WH3947> it to its territory, <WH1366> And that you may discern <WH995> the paths <WH9350> to its home <WH1004>?
"You know, <WH3045> for you were born <WH3205> then, <WH227> And the number <WH4557> of your days <WH3117> is great! <WH7227>
"Have you entered <WH935> the storehouses <WH214> of the snow, <WH7950> Or have you seen <WH7200> the storehouses <WH214> of the hail, <WH1259>
Which <WH834> I have reserved <WH2820> for the time <WH6256> of distress, <WH9496> For the day <WH3117> of war <WH7128> and battle <WH4421>?
"Where <WH335> is the way <WH1870> that the light <WH216> is divided, <WH2505> [Or] the east <WH6921> wind <WH6921> scattered <WH6327> on the earth <WH776>?
"Who <WH4310> has cleft <WH6385> a channel <WH8585> for the flood, <WH7858> Or a way <WH1870> for the thunderbolt <WH6963>; <WH2385>
To bring <WH4305> rain <WH4305> on a land <WH776> without <WH3808> people, <WH376> [On] a desert <WH4057> without <WH3808> a man <WH120> in it,
To satisfy <WH7646> the waste <WH9585> and desolate <WH4875> land, And to make the seeds <WH4161> of grass <WH1877> to sprout <WH6779>?
"Has <WH3426> the rain <WH4306> a father? Or <WH1> who <WH176> has begotten <WH4310> the drops <WH3205> of dew <WH96>?
"From whose <WH4310> womb <WH990> has come <WH3318> the ice <WH7140>? And the frost <WH9214> of heaven, <WH8064> who <WH4310> has given <WH3205> it birth <WH3205>?
"Water <WH4325> becomes <WH2244> hard <WH2244> like stone, <WH68> And the surface <WH6440> of the deep <WH8415> is imprisoned. <WH3920>
"Can you bind <WH7194> the chains <WH4575> of the Pleiades, <WH3598> Or <WH176> loose <WH6605> the cords <WH4189> of Orion <WH3685>?
"Can you lead <WH3318> forth <WH3318> a constellation <WH4216> in its season, <WH6256> And guide <WH5148> the Bear <WH5906> with her satellites <WH1121>?
"Do you know <WH3045> the ordinances <WH2708> of the heavens, <WH8064> Or <WH518> fix <WH7760> their rule <WH4896> over the earth <WH776>?
"Can you lift <WH7311> up your voice <WH6963> to the clouds, <WH5645> So that an abundance <WH8229> of water <WH4325> may cover <WH3680> you?
"Can you send <WH7971> forth lightnings <WH1300> that they may go <WH1980> And say <WH559> to you, 'Here <WH2009> we are'?
"Who <WH4310> has put <WH7896> wisdom <WH2451> in the innermost <WH2910> being, <WH2910> Or <WH176> has given <WH5414> understanding <WH998> to the mind <WH7907>?
"Who <WH4310> can count <WH5608> the clouds <WH7834> by wisdom, <WH2451> Or tip <WH7901> the water <WH9311> jars <WH9311> of the heavens, <WH8064>
When the dust <WH6083> hardens <WH3332> into a mass, <WH4165> And the clods <WH7263> stick <WH1692> together <WH1692>?
"Can you hunt <WH6679> the prey <WH2964> for the lion, <WH3833> Or satisfy <WH4390> the appetite <WH9130> of the young <WH3715> lions, <WH3715>
When <WH3588> they crouch <WH7817> in [their] dens, <WH4585> [And] lie <WH695> in wait <WH695> in [their] lair <WH5521>?
"Who <WH4310> prepares <WH3559> for the raven <WH6158> its nourishment, <WH9479> When <WH3588> its young <WH3206> cry <WH7768> to God, <WH410> And wander <WH8582> about without <WH1097> food <WH400>?
